name: UIFocusHelper
summary: Utilities to help visualize focus guides and quickLookDebugView snapshots without using breakpoints or the debugger.
description: Visualize UIFocusGuides and create focus engine quickLookDebugView snapshots (the ones you usually need to set breakpoints in focus delegate methods in Xcode for). WARNING: The snapshot code uses private frameworks and should not be deployed in any app store apps.
